about_the_game:
Dress up as the most beauteous bovine of all with the Buffalo Costume for STORY OF SEASONS: Pioneers of Olive Town. In order to tame the buffalo, sometimes one must BE the buffalo!

This set includes the following items:
- Buffalo Costume
- Buffalo Headwear

To equip these items in-game, examine the wardrobe in your house or the fitting room in the salon.

* The protagonist outfits will become available once you have completed the town development request to build the salon. You may then commission the outfits from Karina.
* All protagonist outfits can be worn regardless of gender chosen.
